text: mulliwayikkal demala jathi ghathanaya apa uthuru palath sabhawa idiripitadi, anusmaranaya kala awasthawedith, dalwu pahana sinhala polis niladhariyeku wisin bimata thallu kara, thama padayen dalwunu pahana niwu awasthawedith, mulliwayikkal werala thirayedi nawika hamudawe tharjanawalata obben gos, miyagiya pudgalayin wenuwen gaurawaya pudakala awasthawedith, hamudawa wisin ellakala tharjana madhyaye mahawiruwanwa anusmaranaya kala awasthawedith kisindu prakashayak sidunokala daglas dewanandan, me wana wita kumak ho prakasha kala yuthuya yana adahasin saha janathawagen samawa gatha yuthuya yana adahasin mema prakashaya sidukara atha” yanuwen em.ke.shiwajilingam prakasha kara atha.

basnahira palath sabhawe saukhyaya amathyanshaye waya shirshaya parajaya wima pasugiyada siduwiya.mema siddiya mulkaragena dan deshapalana arbudayak nirmanaya wemina pawathi.samannya prajathanthrawadi sampradaya anuwa nam adala amathya waraya thanathuren illa aswiya yuthuya.nishantha warnasinha namathi mema amathya waraya thanathuren illa aswana bawa mulin prakasha kala namuth pasuwa ema adahasa wenas karagena thibe .pasugiya mathiwaranayedi prajathanthrawadaya gana maha ihalin katha kala ohu jathika hela urumaye ihalapele nayakayeki.ebawin ohu illa aswiya yuthuya.nayakayan wisin aadarshaya diya yuthuwanne eseya.namuth dan siduwanne wenath deyaki.podi ewun ge eslon danwime men warada wena ayakuta pawarimaya....aya-waya genawe maha amathi eenisa warada eyage ...podi ewunta wunathwenasa therenawa ..ebawin me amathya waraya illa aswiya yuthumaya.
